class Datasets.Datasets(path=None)¶

Bases: object

Appendicitis(normalize=True)¶

Source: https://sci2s.ugr.es/keel/dataset.php?cod=183

This dataset was proposed in S. M. Weiss, and C. A. Kulikowski, Computer Systems That Learn (1991).

The data represents 7 medical measures taken over 106 patients on which the class label represents if the patient has appendicitis (class label 1) or not (class label 0).

Parameters

normalize (TYPE, optional) – DESCRIPTION. The default is True. False for original data, not in [0,1] range

Returns

  • x (numpy array) – Attributes

  • y (numpy array) – clases

GermanCredit(normalize=True)¶

Source: https://archive.ics.uci.edu/ml/datasets/Statlog+%28German+Credit+Data%29

Professor Dr. Hans Hofmann Institut f”ur Statistik und “Okonometrie Universit”at Hamburg FB Wirtschaftswissenschaften Von-Melle-Park 5 2000 Hamburg 13

This dataset requires use of a cost matrix (see below)

2 5 0

(1 = Good, 2 = Bad)

The rows represent the actual classification and the columns the predicted classification.

It is worse to class a customer as good when they are bad (5), than it is to class a customer as bad when they are good (1).

Parameters

normalize (TYPE, optional) – DESCRIPTION. The default is True. False for original data, not in [0,1] range

Returns

  • x (numpy array) – Attributes

  • y (numpy array) – clases
